jobDescription: All About UsAt Illumina, we apply innovative technologies for studying genetic variation and function, making studies possible that were not even imaginable just a few years ago. These revolutionary tools for DNA, RNA, and protein analysis are enabling rapid advances in disease research, drug development, and the development of molecular tests in the clinic.As a Scientist in Technology Development at Illumina you will work in a dynamic, team-oriented environment and you will play a key role in creating the next generation of genomic tools. You will be a key contributor to multidisciplinary teams developing and improving leading-edge technology platforms.
